text: Two friends went on a field trip. When night came, they slept side by side. One of them dreamed they had taken a boat and had been shipwrecked on an island. When he awoke, he began to ask his partner if he remembered the crossing, the boat and the island. He was stunned when the friend explained that he had not had the same dream. I couldn't believe it. But if it was an incredible dream! He refused to accept that the friend would not remember the voyage, the ship and the island. FIN
title: Los dos amigos
author: nan Anónimo
